text: Henny Meijer (born February 17, 1962) is a former Dutch football player. He has played for the Dutch national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Club Season League Division Apps Goals Telstar 1983–84 Eerste Divisie 32 20 Volendam 1984–85 Eredivisie 33 9 Roda JC 1985–86 Eredivisie 31 8 1986–87 34 19 Ajax 1987–88 Eredivisie 26 11 Groningen 1988–89 Eredivisie 34 15 1989–90 29 8 1990–91 34 12 1991–92 29 10 1992–93 20 4 Verdy Kawasaki 1993 J1 League 11 2 Cambuur 1993–94 Eredivisie 25 8 Heerenveen 1994–95 Eredivisie 13 2 De Graafschap 1995–96 Eredivisie 20 5 Veendam 1996–97 Eerste Divisie 32 14 1997–98 19 3 Total 422 150 ===International=== Netherlands national team Year Apps Goals 1987 1 0 Total 1 0 ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch footballers Category:People from Paramaribo
